summary:
### **Monthly Operating Report – June 2025 Highlights**  

#### **Key Operational & Financial Data**  
- **Mass Market Sales & Netback**  
  - Electricity & gas sales: **410GWh** (vs. 416GWh in June 2024).  
  - Netback: **$146.32/MWh** (vs. $126.34/MWh in June 2024).  

- **Wholesale Business**  
  - Contracted electricity sales: **810GWh** (vs. 795GWh in June 2024).  
  - Net revenue: **$186.08/MWh** (vs. $167.12/MWh in June 2024).  
  - Generation cost: **$54.27/MWh** (vs. $54.53/MWh in June 2024).  

- **Hydro & Storage (as of 14 July 2025)**  
  - South Island storage: **95% of mean**.  
  - North Island storage: **148% of mean**.  
  - Clutha inflows: **84% of mean** (down from 100% in May 2025).  

- **Otahuhu Futures (Q4 2025)**  
  - **$138.3/MWh** (15 Jul) vs. **$133.05/MWh** (30 Jun) vs. **$137.35/MWh** (30 May).  

- **Renewable Projects**  
  - **Glenbrook BESS (Q1 2026, $163m)**  
  - **Kowhai Park Solar (Q2 2026, $273m, JV with Lightsource bp)**  
  - **Te Mihi Geothermal (Q3 2027, $712m)**  

- **Gas Contracts**  
  - Contracted gas volume (next 12 months): **7.5PJ**.  

- **Unallocated Costs**  
  - **$17.9m** spent on proposed **Manawa acquisition** ($10.9m transaction costs, $6.9m integration prep).  

- **Market Demand**  
  - NZ electricity demand: **+1.2% YoY (June 2024)**, **-0.5% vs. June 2023**.  

#### **ESG Metrics**  
- GHG emissions: **190kt CO2-e** (vs. 250kt in Q4 FY24).  
- Employee gender balance: **46% women, 52% men**.  

**No capital markets announcements or material liquidity events identified.**
